text.*:
This is a List of naval flags of the Russian Federation, from independence from the Soviet Union in 1991 onward, for Soviet naval flags see List of USSR navy flags.

Contents

  • 1 Jack
  • 2 Naval Ensign (National naval flag)
    • 2.1 Navy flag
    • 2.2 Ensigns of auxiliary vessels of the Navy
    • 2.3 Naval flag of the National Guard Forces Command
    • 2.4 Flags of ships of Border Guard Force
  • 3 Flags of officials
    • 3.1 Flags of commanders-in-chief of the Armed Forces
    • 3.2 Flags of officials of the Navy
    • 3.3 Flags of officials of the Border Guard Force
    • 3.4 Flags of officials of FSB
  • 4 References
  • 5 See also

Flag Dates of use or adoption Name Note
